messages.message: Doing a lot of super live demos on mobile today. Here was a customer who came to us with an actual live doc. He wanted to create a json for effectively the full doc. I thought this was a fairly straightforward command but AI Hub had a weird response where it sort did provide the json and sort of didnâ€™t while also giving a confusing message. Screenshots attached. (Customer was still impressed by the way)
I always put `` `json at the end to get rid of that, ignore the space between the ticks otherwise it puts it in code mode
@lydia something we should figure out how to force the ticks to get a better response
@Hari - can we do this without explicit instructions by the user.
